main event: Three boys from Amityville, N.Y. observed a hovering light that moved to a new location and descended.
interesting points: The object was bright enough to illuminate the ground., The object went out instantaneously after the sighting., The observation lasted too long to be a meteor., The boys confirmed they had never previously been involved with official agencies., A strange sound accompanied the object which they described as a high-pitched turbo whine.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
